titleStmt.title: A blow at profaneness in a description and a rebuke of it, taken out of the right reverend Bishop Hopkins exposition of the Ten Commandments.
titleStmt.author: Hopkins, Ezekiel, 1634-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside near Mercers-Chapel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge.
